summary: A gang robs a gold shipment from a train. A so called bounty hunter is sent to track down the robbers and decides to let them lead him to the gold.
cast: Edd Byrnes|George Hilton|Gilbert Roland|Stefania Careddu|José Torres|Ivano Staccioli|Gérard Herter|Ignazio Spalla|Adriana Giuffrè|Valentino Macchi|Riccardo Pizzuti|Rodolfo Valadier|Marco Mariani|Sal Borgese|Omero Capanna|Gonzalo de Esquiroz|Lina Franchi|Rocco Lerro|Joaquín Parra|Osiride Pevarello|Guglielmo Spoletini|Clemente Ukmar|Franco Ukmar|José Yepes
keywords: italo western|grindhouse film|street shootout|cowboys and outlaws|boxing
title: Voy, le mato y vuelvo
